meanings.definition: Most authoritative or domineering in a group.
meanings.sent1: She is the bossiest student in the class, always telling others what to do.
meanings.sent2: The bossiest person in the office always gets their way.
meanings.sent3: Even the bossiest cat in the neighborhood couldn't make the birds obey.
meanings.sent4: Her bossiest tone made it clear who was in charge of the project.
meanings.sent5: The bossiest lion in the pride led the hunt with confidence.

meanings.definition: Showing a tendency to give orders in a forceful way.
meanings.sent1: The bossiest teacher in the school never tolerated any misbehavior.
meanings.sent2: His bossiest attitude often rubbed his friends the wrong way.
meanings.sent3: The bossiest squirrel in the park tried to organize the other animals into a parade.
meanings.sent4: Her bossiest expression made everyone stop and listen to her instructions.
meanings.sent5: The bossiest clouds in the sky commanded the rain to fall.
